import React, { useState } from 'react' import StudentService from '../services/StudentService' const AddStudentComponent = () => { const [firstName, setfirstName] = useState('') const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('') const [address, setAddress] = useState('') const [phone, setPhone] = useState('') const [emailId, setEmailId] = useState('') const saveStudent = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const student = {firstName, lastName, address, phone, emailId} StudentService.createStudent(student).then((response => { })).catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } return (
